messages.message: Looks like the pyi files needs some update. Let me put out a PR to fix it.
Hmmmmm yeah, the stubs are manually edited. Thanks for jumping on this Jeff!

ah i assumed that the pyi files were auto-generated, so i wasn't sure about making manual changes :sweat_smile:

thanks for making https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/69045, @Jeff! i'll rebase my pr after it's merged :pray:

Parsing proto fails if that field exists in the data and not in the proto.
We had an incident in the past related to this and in general I am hesitant to delete things from proto file.

In general, this is true ^

In this case, we control both the client and the server, so I'd rather do the cleanup.

May I get a stamp on the PR?
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/69045
